5.eng-name: The Book of Mosques and Places of Prayer

hadiths.text: This hadith is narrated on the authority of Alqama and Aswad by another chain of transmitters and in the hadith transmitted by Ibn Mus-hir and Jabir the words are:" I perceive as if I am seeing the gap between the fingers of the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) as he was bowing

chapter.ara-name: باب النَّدْبِ إِلَى وَضْعِ الأَيْدِي عَلَى الرُّكَبِ فِي الرُّكُوعِ وَنَسْخِ التَّطْبِيقِ
chapter.eng-name: The recommendation to place the hands on the knees when bowing, and the abrogation of tatbiq
